thread.title: Will my organic rankings suffer if I don’t have a blog?
thread.title_full: Will my organic rankings suffer if I don’t have a blog?

author: Stephanie LeVonne
title: Will my organic rankings suffer if I don’t have a blog?
text:
A blog can be a major investment, but the SEO benefits can make it worth the effort. Columnist Stephanie LeVonne makes the case for why blogging works to improve search visibility.

Please visit Marketing Land for the full article.
